#1 Task:(solved)

How do we find information that is displayed on Google maps? For example, if I search for movie theatres in Chicago I see a set of red dots. How can I download all those location (name, address, etc) into excel?

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

fail to find correct content

I'm Petr Hess and I'm Google Master Searcher and I like to share with you my experiences, my knowledge from 8 years of Google.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Start to use New style of Google Searching

title: Google Search Engine: Master Skills For Searching
